name: Who Was The Cat?
description:
KEEP A COOL HEAD!

WHO WAS THE CAT? is the spectacular debut of the TELEPATH art collective! Taking influence from such games as Alien Soldier, Stretch Panic and even a little bit of Devil May Cry, WHO WAS THE CAT? an old school fast-paced action run-and-gun with a strong emphasis on boss battles!

Play as Milo the purple one-eyed cat and face off against tough foes that put your dodging and shooting skills to the ultimate test!

The 2021 SAGE Demo lets you face off against one of the planned four bosses. Can you play well enough to obtain the elusive S RANK?

  • Support for both GAMEPAD and KEYBOARD controls! (Though PS5 controllers are a bit wonky)
  • TWIN STICK setup allows you to move and shoot independently!
  • Time your dodges perfectly to weave your way through tough-as-nails boss attack patterns!
  • Modern Character Action-style ranking system! Keep up your combo and don't get hit! 

CONTROLS
KEYBOARD
WASD - Move
SPACE - Jump
SHIFT/RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON - Dodge
ARROW KEYS - 8-direction shooting
LEFT MOUSE BUTTON - Analog shooting
CTRL - Toggle Auto-Fire
ENTER - Pause
GAMEPAD
D-PAD/LEFT STICK - Move
LB - Jump
RB - Dodge
FACE BUTTONS - 8-direction shooting
RIGHT STICK - Analog shooting
R3 - Toggle Auto-Fire
START - Pause
